Token.Abstract: The Bit6CurrentLocationControllerDelegate protocol defines the methods a delegate of a Bit6CurrentLocationController object should implement. The methods of this protocol notify your delegate when the user's location has been obtained.
Called when the user's location couldn't be obtained.

Parameter.Name: b6clc
Parameter.Abstract: The controller object obtaining the user's location.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: the error object describing the problem to obtain the location

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: same message object set in [Bit6CurrentLocationController startListeningToLocationForMessage:delegate:] with the user's location set.

Token.Abstract: Called when the user's location has been obtained.

Parameter.Name: b6clc
Parameter.Abstract: The controller object obtaining the user's location.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: same message object set in [Bit6CurrentLocationController startListeningToLocationForMessage:delegate:] with the user's location set.
